name: Telegram Bot Sender
description: Universal Telegram message sender. Accepts typed message requests (text, photo, document, etc.) and sends via Bot API.

inputs.name: message
inputs.description: Telegram message request object (text, photo, document, etc.)

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Send result with message_id and status

settings.name: defaultChatId
settings.label: Default Chat ID
settings.description: Default chat ID (can be overridden by message.chatId)

settings.name: retryOnError
settings.label: Retry on Error
settings.description: Retry failed requests (rate limits, network errors)
